data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 168 believers in the state of Badakhshan.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Badakhshan, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Badakhshan access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Badakhshan, Afghanistan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Badakhshan, Afghanistan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Kalash (Chitrali) people.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Badakhshan.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 168 believers in Badakhshan to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,053,933 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary:
the state of Badakhshan, Afghanistan has a population of 1,054,100.

We estimate Badakhshan has 168 people who might know Jesus, 33 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,053,900 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,274 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 168 believers in the state of Badakhshan to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.
